plans.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to view your plans
plans.invalidJsonFormat: Invalid JSON file format. Please check your file and try again.
plans.invalidPlanFormat: Invalid plan format. The file does not contain a valid plan structure.
plans.dropPlanFileHere: Drop your plan file here to import
plans.importPlanFromJson: Import a plan from a JSON file
plans.noPlansYet: No plans yet. Create one or import an existing plan.

chat.inputPlaceholder: Type your response here and let Magentic-UI know of any changes in the browser.
chat.regeneratePlanMessage: Regenerate a plan that improves on the current plan
chat.websocketNotAvailableOrNotOpen: WebSocket not available or not open
chat.enterMessageToGetStarted: Enter a message to get started

settings.title: Settings
settings.settingsChangesWarning: Warning: Settings changes will only apply when you create a new session
settings.failedToLoadSettings: Failed to load settings. Using defaults.
settings.modelConfigurationTooltip1: YAML configuration for the underlying LLM of the agents.
settings.modelConfigurationTooltip2: The configuration uses AutoGen ChatCompletionClient format.
settings.modelConfigurationTooltip3: Must include configurations for: orchestrator_client, coder_client, web_surfer_client, and file_surfer_client.
settings.modelConfigurationTooltip4: Each client should follow the AutoGen ChatCompletionClient specification with provider, config (model, etc), and max_retries.
settings.modelConfigurationTooltip5: Changes require a new session to take effect.
settings.selectLlmForAllClientsTooltip: This will update the model configuration for all agent clients (orchestrator, coder, web surfer, and file surfer)
settings.selectModelPlaceholder: Select model to use for all clients

generalSettings.title: General Settings
generalSettings.allowedWebsitesTooltip: When enabled, Magentic-UI will only be able to visit websites you add to the list below.
generalSettings.approvalPolicyTooltip: Controls when approval is required before taking actions
generalSettings.allowReplansTooltip: When enabled, Magentic-UI will automatically replan if the current plan is not working or you change the original request
generalSettings.doBingSearchTooltip: When enabled, Magentic-UI will use Bing Search when coming up with a plan. Note this adds 10 seconds to the planning time.
generalSettings.retrieveRelevantPlansTooltip: Controls how Magentic-UI retrieves and uses relevant plans from previous sessions
generalSettings.browserHeadlessTooltip: Only applicable when running without docker. When enabled, the browser will run in headless mode (no UI).
generalSettings.validationWarning: You must add at least one website to the Allowed Websites list or turn off this feature

agentSettings.title: Agent Settings
agentSettings.mcpAgentsDescription: Extend Magentic-UI's capabilities by adding custom agents that connect to local or remote Model Context Protocol (MCP) Servers!
agentSettings.mcpAgentsRequirement: Any number of agents are supported, and each agent requires at least one MCP Server.
agentSettings.noMcpAgents: No MCP Agents. Click "Add MCP Agent" to create one.
agentSettings.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this agent can do. The orchestrator will use this description to determine when to hand off to this agent.
agentSettings.mcpServerRequired: At least one MCP Server is required
agentSettings.noMcpServers: No MCP Servers. Click "Add MCP Server" to create one.
agentSettings.setLlmForEachAgent: Set the LLM for each agent
agentSettings.setLlmForAllAgents: Set the LLM for all agents
agentSettings.toggleBasicAdvancedTooltip: Toggle between Basic and Advanced settings

security.securityNoteText: Magentic-UI cannot see what you do when you take control. Be cautious about entering passwords or sensitive information.
security.cantSee: Magentic-UI can't see what you do when you take control.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Please tell us about your experience

messages.mistakes: Magentic-UI can make mistakes. Please monitor its work and intervene if necessary.

sampleTasks.orTrySampleTask: or try a sample task from below
sampleTasks.guangzhouWeather: What's the weather in Guangzhou today?
sampleTasks.postOfficeHours: When does the post office near me close today?
sampleTasks.microsoftResearchPapers: Find the latest publications from the Microsoft Research AI Frontiers Lab on Human-Agent interaction
sampleTasks.markitdownMCPCommit: Which commit of Microsoft/markitdown repo introduced MCP support?
sampleTasks.autogenSummaryPython: Can you make a Markdown file with python that summarizes the Microsoft AutoGen repo?
sampleTasks.customPizzaOrder: Order me a custom pizza from Tangle Town Pub with sausage, pineapple, and black olives
sampleTasks.arxivComputerAgents: Search arXiv for the latest papers on computer use agents

planCard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{{task}}"?
planCard.runPlanTooltip: Create a new session with this plan loaded

chatInput.imageTooLarge: Pasted image is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
chatInput.largeTextConvertedToFileDescription: Your pasted text has been attached as a file.
chatInput.fileTooLarge: {{fileName}} is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
chatInput.unsupportedFileTypeDescription: Please upload only text (.txt), CSV (.csv), Excel (.xls, .xlsx) or images (.jpg, .png, .gif, .svg) files.

learnPlanButton.planSavedToLibrary: This plan has been saved to your library
learnPlanButton.creatingPlanFromConversation: Creating a plan from this conversation
learnPlanButton.learnReusablePlan: Learn a reusable plan from this conversation and save it to your library

sessionManager.noSessionsFound: No sessions found, creating default session...

planView.youCanEditDirectlyOrThroughChat: You can edit it directly or through the chat.
planView.potentiallyRelevantPlanFromMemory: Potentially relevant plan retrieved from memory.

mcpServers.title: MCP Servers
mcpServers.subtitle: Manage Model Context Protocol servers to extend your agent's capabilities
mcpServers.addServerDescription: Connect new capabilities to your agent

mcpConfig.serverNameRequired: Server Name is required and can only contain letters and numbers.
mcpConfig.agentNameHelp: Agent name must be a valid Python identifier (letters, numbers, underscores only, must start with letter or underscore)
mcpConfig.agentDescriptionPlaceholder: This agent can help you with... Use this server when the user needs to...
mcpConfig.agentDescriptionHelp: Describe how and when this server should be used. This helps the orchestrator decide when to call this agent.
mcpConfig.invalidJsonFile: Please upload a valid JSON file
mcpConfig.jsonDragDropHint: Drag and drop a JSON file directly onto the textarea, or paste JSON content.

sessionEditor.pleaseCheckFormForErrors: Please check the form for errors

signIn.changeUsernameWillCreateNewProfile: A change of username will create a new profile
